00038 @implementation CPScrollView : CPView
00039 {
00040     CPClipView  _contentView;
00041     CPClipView  _headerClipView;
00042     CPView      _cornerView;
00043 
00044     BOOL        _hasVerticalScroller;
00045     BOOL        _hasHorizontalScroller;
00046     BOOL        _autohidesScrollers;
00047     
00048     CPScroller  _verticalScroller;
00049     CPScroller  _horizontalScroller;

00059 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00060 {
00061     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00062 
00063     if (self)
00064     {
00065         _verticalLineScroll = 10.0;
00066         _verticalPageScroll = 10.0;
00067 
00068         _horizontalLineScroll = 10.0;
00069         _horizontalPageScroll = 10.0;
00070 
00071         _contentView = [[CPClipView alloc] initWithFrame:[self bounds]];
00072 
00073         [self addSubview:_contentView];
00074 
00075         _headerClipView = [[CPClipView alloc] init];
00076 
00077         [self addSubview:_headerClipView];
00078 
00079         [self setHasVerticalScroller:YES];
00080         [self setHasHorizontalScroller:YES];
00081     }
00082 
00083     return self;
00084 }

00090 - (CGRect)contentSize
00091 {
00092     return [_contentView frame].size;

00098 - (id)documentView
00099 {
00100     return [_contentView documentView];

00102 
00107 - (void)setContentView:(CPClipView)aContentView
00108 {
00109     if (_contentView !== aContentView || !aContentView)
00110         return;
00111 
00112     var documentView = [aContentView documentView];
00113 
00114     if (documentView)
00115         [documentView removeFromSuperview];
00116 
00117     [_contentView removeFromSuperview];
00118 
00119     _contentView = aContentView;
00120 
00121     [_contentView setDocumentView:documentView];
00122 
00123     [self addSubview:_contentView];
00124 
00125     // This will size the content view appropriately, so no need to size it in this method.
00126     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00127 }
00128 
00132 - (CPClipView)contentView
00133 {
00134     return _contentView;
00135 }
00136 
00141 - (void)setDocumentView:(CPView)aView
00142 {
00143     [_contentView setDocumentView:aView];
00144 
00145     // FIXME: This should be observed.
00146     [self _updateCornerAndHeaderView];
00147     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00148 }
00149 
00154 - (void)reflectScrolledClipView:(CPClipView)aClipView
00155 {
00156     if(_contentView !== aClipView)
00157         return;
00158 
00159     if (_recursionCount > 5)
00160         return;
00161     
00162     ++_recursionCount;
00163 
00164     var documentView = [self documentView];
00165     
00166     if (!documentView)
00167     {
00168         if (_autohidesScrollers)
00169         {
00170             [_verticalScroller setHidden:YES];
00171             [_horizontalScroller setHidden:YES];
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175 //            [_verticalScroller setEnabled:NO];
00176 //            [_horizontalScroller setEnabled:NO];
00177         }
00178 
00179         [_contentView setFrame:[self bounds]];
00180         [_headerClipView setFrame:_CGRectMakeZero()];
00181 
00182         --_recursionCount;
00183 
00184         return;
00185     }
00186 
00187     var documentFrame = [documentView frame], // the size of the whole document
00188         contentFrame = [self bounds], // assume it takes up the entire size of the scrollview (no scrollers)
00189         headerClipViewFrame = [self _headerClipViewFrame],
00190         headerClipViewHeight = _CGRectGetHeight(headerClipViewFrame);
00191 
00192     contentFrame.origin.y += headerClipViewHeight;
00193     contentFrame.size.height -= headerClipViewHeight;
00194 
00195     var difference = _CGSizeMake(_CGRectGetWidth(documentFrame) - _CGRectGetWidth(contentFrame), _CGRectGetHeight(documentFrame) - _CGRectGetHeight(contentFrame)),
00196         verticalScrollerWidth = _CGRectGetWidth([_verticalScroller frame]),
00197         horizontalScrollerHeight = _CGRectGetHeight([_horizontalScroller frame]),
00198         hasVerticalScroll = difference.height > 0.0,
00199         hasHorizontalScroll = difference.width > 0.0,
00200         shouldShowVerticalScroller = _hasVerticalScroller && (!_autohidesScrollers || hasVerticalScroll),
00201         shouldShowHorizontalScroller = _hasHorizontalScroller && (!_autohidesScrollers || hasHorizontalScroll);
00202 
00203     // Now we have to account for the shown scrollers affecting the deltas.
00204     if (shouldShowVerticalScroller)
00205     {
00206         difference.width += verticalScrollerWidth;
00207         hasHorizontalScroll = difference.width > 0.0;
00208         shouldShowHorizontalScroller = _hasHorizontalScroller && (!_autohidesScrollers || hasHorizontalScroll);
00209     }
00210 
00211     if (shouldShowHorizontalScroller)
00212     {
00213         difference.height += horizontalScrollerHeight;
00214         hasVerticalScroll = difference.height > 0.0;
00215         shouldShowVerticalScroller = _hasVerticalScroller && (!_autohidesScrollers || hasVerticalScroll);
00216     }
00217 
00218     // We now definitively know which scrollers are shown or not, as well as whether they are showing scroll values.
00219     [_verticalScroller setHidden:!shouldShowVerticalScroller];
00220     [_verticalScroller setEnabled:hasVerticalScroll];
00221 
00222     [_horizontalScroller setHidden:!shouldShowHorizontalScroller];
00223     [_horizontalScroller setEnabled:hasHorizontalScroll];
00224 
00225     // We can thus appropriately account for them changing the content size.
00226     if (shouldShowVerticalScroller)
00227         contentFrame.size.width -= verticalScrollerWidth;
00228 
00229     if (shouldShowHorizontalScroller)
00230         contentFrame.size.height -= horizontalScrollerHeight;
00231 
00232     var scrollPoint = [_contentView bounds].origin,
00233         wasShowingVerticalScroller = ![_verticalScroller isHidden],
00234         wasShowingHorizontalScroller = ![_horizontalScroller isHidden];
00235 
00236     if (shouldShowVerticalScroller)
00237     {
00238         var verticalScrollerY = MAX(_CGRectGetHeight([self _cornerViewFrame]), headerClipViewHeight),
00239             verticalScrollerHeight = _CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]) - verticalScrollerY;
00240 
00241         if (shouldShowHorizontalScroller)
00242             verticalScrollerHeight -= horizontalScrollerHeight;
00243 
00244         [_verticalScroller setFloatValue:(difference.height <= 0.0) ? 0.0 : scrollPoint.y / difference.height];
00245         [_verticalScroller setKnobProportion:_CGRectGetHeight(contentFrame) / _CGRectGetHeight(documentFrame)];
00246         [_verticalScroller setFrame:_CGRectMake(_CGRectGetMaxX(contentFrame), verticalScrollerY, verticalScrollerWidth, verticalScrollerHeight)];
00247     }
00248     else if (wasShowingVerticalScroller)
00249     {
00250         [_verticalScroller setFloatValue:0.0];
00251         [_verticalScroller setKnobProportion:1.0];
00252     }
00253     
00254     if (shouldShowHorizontalScroller)
00255     {
00256         [_horizontalScroller setFloatValue:(difference.width <= 0.0) ? 0.0 : scrollPoint.x / difference.width];
00257         [_horizontalScroller setKnobProportion:_CGRectGetWidth(contentFrame) / _CGRectGetWidth(documentFrame)];
00258         [_horizontalScroller setFrame:_CGRectMake(0.0, _CGRectGetMaxY(contentFrame), _CGRectGetWidth(contentFrame), horizontalScrollerHeight)];
00259     }
00260     else if (wasShowingHorizontalScroller)
00261     {
00262         [_horizontalScroller setFloatValue:0.0];
00263         [_horizontalScroller setKnobProportion:1.0];
00264     }
00265 
00266     [_contentView setFrame:contentFrame];
00267     [_headerClipView setFrame:headerClipViewFrame];
00268     [_cornerView setFrame:[self _cornerViewFrame]];
00269 
00270     --_recursionCount;
00271 }
00272 
00273 // Managing Scrollers
00278 - (void)setHorizontalScroller:(CPScroller)aScroller
00279 {
00280     if (_horizontalScroller === aScroller)
00281         return;
00282     
00283     [_horizontalScroller removeFromSuperview];
00284     [_horizontalScroller setTarget:nil];
00285     [_horizontalScroller setAction:nil];
00286     
00287     _horizontalScroller = aScroller;
00288     
00289     [_horizontalScroller setTarget:self];
00290     [_horizontalScroller setAction:@selector(_horizontalScrollerDidScroll:)];
00291 
00292     [self addSubview:_horizontalScroller];
00293 
00294     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00295 }
00296 
00300 - (CPScroller)horizontalScroller
00301 {
00302     return _horizontalScroller;
00303 }
00304 
00310 - (void)setHasHorizontalScroller:(BOOL)shouldHaveHorizontalScroller
00311 {
00312     if (_hasHorizontalScroller === shouldHaveHorizontalScroller)
00313         return;
00314 
00315     _hasHorizontalScroller = shouldHaveHorizontalScroller;
00316 
00317     if (_hasHorizontalScroller && !_horizontalScroller)
00318         [self setHorizontalScroller:[[CPScroller alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, _CGRectGetWidth([self bounds]), [CPScroller scrollerWidth])]];
00319 
00320     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00321 }
00322 
00326 - (BOOL)hasHorizontalScroller
00327 {
00328     return _hasHorizontalScroller;
00329 }
00330

00336 {
00337     if (_verticalScroller === aScroller)
00338         return;
00339     
00340     [_verticalScroller removeFromSuperview];
00341     [_verticalScroller setTarget:nil];
00342     [_verticalScroller setAction:nil];
00343     
00344     _verticalScroller = aScroller;
00345     
00346     [_verticalScroller setTarget:self];
00347     [_verticalScroller setAction:@selector(_verticalScrollerDidScroll:)];
00348 
00349     [self addSubview:_verticalScroller];
00350 
00351     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00352 }

00368 - (void)setHasVerticalScroller:(BOOL)shouldHaveVerticalScroller
00369 {
00370     if (_hasVerticalScroller === shouldHaveVerticalScroller)
00371         return;
00372 
00373     _hasVerticalScroller = shouldHaveVerticalScroller;
00374 
00375     if (_hasVerticalScroller && !_verticalScroller)
00376         [self setVerticalScroller:[[CPScroller alloc] initWithFrame:_CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, [CPScroller scrollerWidth], _CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]))]];
00377 
00378     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00379 }

00394 - (void)setAutohidesScrollers:(BOOL)autohidesScrollers
00395 {
00396     if (_autohidesScrollers == autohidesScrollers)
00397         return;
00398 
00399     _autohidesScrollers = autohidesScrollers;
00400     
00401     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00402 }

00408 - (BOOL)autohidesScrollers
00409 {
00410     return _autohidesScrollers;

00413 - (void)_updateCornerAndHeaderView
00414 {
00415     var documentView = [self documentView],
00416         currentHeaderView = [self _headerView],
00417         documentHeaderView = [documentView respondsToSelector:@selector(headerView)] ? [documentView headerView] : nil;
00418 
00419     if (currentHeaderView !== documentHeaderView)
00420     {
00421         [currentHeaderView removeFromSuperview];
00422         [_headerClipView setDocumentView:documentHeaderView];
00423     }
00424 
00425     var documentCornerView = [documentView respondsToSelector:@selector(cornerView)] ? [documentView cornerView] : nil;
00426 
00427     if (_cornerView !== documentCornerView)
00428     {
00429         [_cornerView removeFromSuperview];
00430 
00431         _cornerView = documentCornerView;
00432 
00433         if (_cornerView)
00434             [self addSubview:_cornerView];
00435     }
00436 
00437     [self reflectScrolledClipView:_contentView];
00438 }
00439 
00440 - (CPView)_headerView
00441 {
00442     var headerClipViewSubviews = [_headerClipView subviews];
00443 
00444     return [headerClipViewSubviews count] ? headerClipViewSubviews[0] : nil;
00445 }
00446 
00447 - (CGRect)_cornerViewFrame
00448 {
00449     if (!_cornerView)
00450         return _CGRectMakeZero();
00451 
00452     var bounds = [self bounds],
00453         frame = [_cornerView frame];
00454 
00455     frame.origin.x = _CGRectGetMaxX(bounds) - _CGRectGetWidth(frame);
00456     frame.origin.y = 0;
00457 
00458     return frame;
00459 }
00460 
00461 - (CGRect)_headerClipViewFrame
00462 {
00463     var headerView = [self _headerView];
00464 
00465     if (!headerView)
00466         return _CGRectMakeZero();
00467 
00468     var frame = [self bounds];
00469 
00470     frame.size.height = _CGRectGetHeight([headerView frame]);
00471     frame.size.width -= _CGRectGetWidth([self _cornerViewFrame]);
00472 
00473     return frame;
00474 }
00475 
00476 /* @ignore */
00477 - (void)_verticalScrollerDidScroll:(CPScroller)aScroller
00478 {
00479    var  value = [aScroller floatValue],
00480         documentFrame = [[_contentView documentView] frame];
00481         contentBounds = [_contentView bounds];
00482 
00483     switch ([_verticalScroller hitPart])
00484     {
00485         case CPScrollerDecrementLine:   contentBounds.origin.y -= _verticalLineScroll;
00486                                         break;
00487         
00488         case CPScrollerIncrementLine:   contentBounds.origin.y += _verticalLineScroll;
00489                                         break;
00490            
00491         case CPScrollerDecrementPage:   contentBounds.origin.y -= _CGRectGetHeight(contentBounds) - _verticalPageScroll;
00492                                         break;
00493         
00494         case CPScrollerIncrementPage:   contentBounds.origin.y += _CGRectGetHeight(contentBounds) - _verticalPageScroll;
00495                                         break;
00496         
00497         case CPScrollerKnobSlot:
00498         case CPScrollerKnob:
00499                                         // We want integral bounds!
00500         default:                        contentBounds.origin.y = ROUND(value * (_CGRectGetHeight(documentFrame) - _CGRectGetHeight(contentBounds)));
00501     }
00502     
00503     [_contentView scrollToPoint:contentBounds.origin];
00504 }
00505 
00506 /* @ignore */
00507 - (void)_horizontalScrollerDidScroll:(CPScroller)aScroller
00508 {
00509    var value = [aScroller floatValue],
00510        documentFrame = [[self documentView] frame],
00511        contentBounds = [_contentView bounds];
00512         
00513     switch ([_horizontalScroller hitPart])
00514     {
00515         case CPScrollerDecrementLine:   contentBounds.origin.x -= _horizontalLineScroll;
00516                                         break;
00517         
00518         case CPScrollerIncrementLine:   contentBounds.origin.x += _horizontalLineScroll;
00519                                         break;
00520            
00521         case CPScrollerDecrementPage:   contentBounds.origin.x -= _CGRectGetWidth(contentBounds) - _horizontalPageScroll;
00522                                         break;
00523         
00524         case CPScrollerIncrementPage:   contentBounds.origin.x += _CGRectGetWidth(contentBounds) - _horizontalPageScroll;
00525                                         break;
00526         
00527         case CPScrollerKnobSlot:
00528         case CPScrollerKnob:
00529                                         // We want integral bounds!
00530         default:                        contentBounds.origin.x = ROUND(value * (_CGRectGetWidth(documentFrame) - _CGRectGetWidth(contentBounds)));
00531     }
00532 
00533     [_contentView scrollToPoint:contentBounds.origin];
00534     [_headerClipView scrollToPoint:CGPointMake(contentBounds.origin.x, 0.0)];
00535 }

00545     // scroll: refl.
00546 }

00665 - (void)scrollWheel:(CPEvent)anEvent
00666 {
00667    var documentFrame = [[self documentView] frame],
00668        contentBounds = [_contentView bounds];
00669 
00670     // We want integral bounds!
00671     contentBounds.origin.x = ROUND(contentBounds.origin.x + [anEvent deltaX] * _horizontalLineScroll);
00672     contentBounds.origin.y = ROUND(contentBounds.origin.y + [anEvent deltaY] * _verticalLineScroll);
00673 
00674     [_contentView scrollToPoint:contentBounds.origin];
00675     [_headerClipView scrollToPoint:CGPointMake(contentBounds.origin.x, 0.0)];
00676 }
00677 
00678 - (void)keyDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00679 {
00680     var keyCode = [anEvent keyCode],
00681         documentFrame = [[self documentView] frame],
00682         contentBounds = [_contentView bounds];
00683     
00684     switch (keyCode)
00685     {
00686         case 33:    /*pageup*/
00687                     contentBounds.origin.y -= _CGRectGetHeight(contentBounds) - _verticalPageScroll;
00688                     break;
00689                     
00690         case 34:    /*pagedown*/
00691                     contentBounds.origin.y += _CGRectGetHeight(contentBounds) - _verticalPageScroll;
00692                     break;
00693                     
00694         case 38:    /*up arrow*/
00695                     contentBounds.origin.y -= _verticalLineScroll;
00696                     break;
00697 
00698         case 40:    /*down arrow*/
00699                     contentBounds.origin.y += _verticalLineScroll;
00700                     break;
00701                     
00702         case 37:    /*left arrow*/
00703                     contentBounds.origin.x -= _horizontalLineScroll;
00704                     break;
00705 
00706         case 49:    /*right arrow*/
00707                     contentBounds.origin.x += _horizontalLineScroll;
00708                     break;
00709                     
00710         default:    return [super keyDown:anEvent];
00711     }
00712 
00713     [_contentView scrollToPoint:contentBounds.origin];
00714     [_headerClipView scrollToPoint:CGPointMake(contentBounds.origin, 0)];
00715 }

00717 @end
00718 
00719 var CPScrollViewContentViewKey       = "CPScrollViewContentView",
00720     CPScrollViewHeaderClipViewKey    = "CPScrollViewHeaderClipViewKey",
00721     CPScrollViewVLineScrollKey       = "CPScrollViewVLineScroll",
00722     CPScrollViewHLineScrollKey       = "CPScrollViewHLineScroll",
00723     CPScrollViewVPageScrollKey       = "CPScrollViewVPageScroll",
00724     CPScrollViewHPageScrollKey       = "CPScrollViewHPageScroll",
00725     CPScrollViewHasVScrollerKey      = "CPScrollViewHasVScroller",
00726     CPScrollViewHasHScrollerKey      = "CPScrollViewHasHScroller",
00727     CPScrollViewVScrollerKey         = "CPScrollViewVScroller",
00728     CPScrollViewHScrollerKey         = "CPScrollViewHScroller",
00729     CPScrollViewAutohidesScrollerKey = "CPScrollViewAutohidesScroller";
00730 
00731 @implementation CPScrollView (CPCoding)
00732 
00733 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00734 {
00735     if (self = [super initWithCoder:aCoder])
00736     {
00737         _verticalLineScroll     = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPScrollViewVLineScrollKey];
00738         _verticalPageScroll     = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPScrollViewVPageScrollKey];
00739 
00740         _horizontalLineScroll   = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPScrollViewHLineScrollKey];
00741         _horizontalPageScroll   = [aCoder decodeFloatForKey:CPScrollViewHPageScrollKey];
00742         
00743         _contentView            = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPScrollViewContentViewKey];
00744         _headerClipView         = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPScrollViewHeaderClipViewKey];
00745         
00746         _verticalScroller       = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPScrollViewVScrollerKey];
00747         _horizontalScroller     = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPScrollViewHScrollerKey];
00748 
00749         _hasVerticalScroller    = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPScrollViewHasVScrollerKey];
00750         _hasHorizontalScroller  = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPScrollViewHasHScrollerKey];
00751         _autohidesScrollers     = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPScrollViewAutohidesScrollerKey];
00752         
00753         // Do to the anything goes nature of decoding, our subviews may not exist yet, so layout at the end of the run loop when we're sure everything is in a correct state.
00754         [[CPRunLoop currentRunLoop] performSelector:@selector(reflectScrolledClipView:) target:self argument:_contentView order:0 modes:[CPDefaultRunLoopMode]];
00755     }
00756     
00757     return self;
00758 }
00759 
00760 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00761 {
00762     [super encodeWithCoder:aCoder];
00763     
00764     [aCoder encodeObject:_contentView           forKey:CPScrollViewContentViewKey];
00765     [aCoder encodeObject:_headerClipView        forKey:CPScrollViewHeaderClipViewKey];
00766 
00767     [aCoder encodeObject:_verticalScroller      forKey:CPScrollViewVScrollerKey];
00768     [aCoder encodeObject:_horizontalScroller    forKey:CPScrollViewHScrollerKey];
00769     
00770     [aCoder encodeFloat:_verticalLineScroll     forKey:CPScrollViewVLineScrollKey];
00771     [aCoder encodeFloat:_verticalPageScroll     forKey:CPScrollViewVPageScrollKey];
00772     [aCoder encodeFloat:_horizontalLineScroll   forKey:CPScrollViewHLineScrollKey];
00773     [aCoder encodeFloat:_horizontalPageScroll   forKey:CPScrollViewHPageScrollKey];
00774     
00775     [aCoder encodeBool:_hasVerticalScroller     forKey:CPScrollViewHasVScrollerKey];
00776     [aCoder encodeBool:_hasHorizontalScroller   forKey:CPScrollViewHasHScrollerKey];
00777     [aCoder encodeBool:_autohidesScrollers      forKey:CPScrollViewAutohidesScrollerKey];
00778 }
